data.claim: Glassmorphism Designer Card final recipe: Environment = 4 giant off-canvas radial gradient blobs (120%+ size, -55% offset) + vignette. Glass card = 7% white fill + 24px backdrop blur + 15% white border + diagonal sheen + top haze. Typography layout = "Glass" bold + "morphic effect" regular left, "Let's create" orange italic right, stacked heading below.
